title: Simple Calculator Program
description: Create a simple calculator program in Python with an add function and a corresponding test.
acceptance_criteria: A Python file named calculator.py containing a function called add.
The add function takes two numbers as input and returns their sum.
A Python file named test_calculator.py containing a test for the add function.
tests_to_run: Run the tests in test_calculator.py to ensure the add function works correctly.
